metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3870 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: omx/SimpleSoftOMXComponent.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before2016-09-01, and 7.0 before 2016-09-01 does not prevent input-port changes,which allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, akainternal bug 29421804.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
